amendment.description: An amendment numbered 79 printed in Part B of House Report 118-269 to prohibit the use of funds to implement, finalize, or enforce the proposed rule entitled "Enhanced Disclosures by Certain Investment Advisers and Investment Companies About Environmental, Social, and Governance Investment Practices.".

vote.text: On agreeing to the Norman amendment (A047) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Norman amendment (A047) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Norman amendment (A047) Agreed to by voice vote.
